name: Tara Mayfield
text: If I could give less than 1 star, I would. I placed an order online. When the pizza arrived, it was completely wrong. I called, spoke with someone who identified himself as the manager and advised him of the problem. I received the 2nd …More

name: Tammy Moody
text: Great employees. They really try 2 help you get the best deal for your money.

name: Cheryl McDermitt
text: Had delivery. Did not have the bread sticks with the pasta. I called, she said they would send them right out. They never came. The pasta and thin crust pepperoni pizza were all pretty dry. Definitely cooked too long or sat too long. We've eaten from there for years. I think we will be taking a break for awhile.

name: Bunny Hogue
text: The customer service is terrible. My food was burnt and I didn't feel like going back to wait another 40 minutes for someone to acknowledge me and to check on my order. I do not recommend this place.

name: jason lowery
text: Pizza was awful. No taste, poor texture and awful ingredients. How is this business still open?

name: Cozysavage
text: Watched a customer make their own order because the staff was too lazy to make a big order. It there job to make what ever is ordered not the customers.

name: Pamela Irvin
text: This is by far the worse Pizza Hut I have ever ordered from. I truly don’t know what happened to this location but it has went so far down hill it’s buried. If you opt for delivery be prepared to get only a partial of your order this has …More

name: Thomas Huettl
text: Its pizza, BUT very polite and friendly front staff.

name: Lakeya Simpson
text: The only reason I'm leaving this feedback is because Tyler is amazing! Very sweet and attentive kid! Carried all 8 of my pizzas to my car! Great asset!

name: Tarvis Ridges
text: I called and ordered a pizza at 11:41. They told me they were not delivering which was understandable. The guy told me I could place an order to pick up and it would be ready in 15 mins. I pulled up at 11:57 all the lights were out and no …More

name: Robert Taylor
text: I order from here all the time. Been waiting for 2 hours for my order, called and manager said they cancelled it. Then said he can only send my order if I pay with a credit card. Again I ordered from here a lot, no more of that.

name: CJ M
text: So....I ordered a personal pan to pick up. I arrive at the location and it seemed as the cashier was somewhat bothered. Ok..oh well. As she gave me my pizza from the heater, I noticed an employee making a pizza with ONE glove on, handling …More

name: Andrea Todd
text: I try not to give anyone such a low rating, but this Pizza Hut is the worst! They have gotten my order wrong so many times.  Last week was one of those times. I went over my order again right before I got off the phone and it was still …More

name: Jimmie Baker
text: The quality of the food is fine, however, what drives the stars down is the pricing being VERY inconsistent.  We order practically the same thing every time, and often. Some people do 20 percent for the military discount and some …More

name: Evan G
text: Pizza was good. Curbside was not

name: Anna Salinas
text: Best food. Hot & Ready..

name: Jarod RS
text: I’ve been waiting 3 hours for a delivery lol. Still haven’t received it. It got delivered to the wrong house.

name: Tim Marlowe
text: Worst experience! It took a hour and a half to deliver, the food was Cold and the order was wrong? Very Disappointed!!

name: Edgar Funderburk
text: Went to Subway not Pizza Hut.

name: Julie Reed
text: Fabulous. Stopped on spur of moment.  Pizza absolutely loaded down with toppings.  New fave spot for Pizza. PS  if you want hot good pizza go pick it up.  Don't depend on delivery

name: Laurie Ann Kortsch
text: 1st I'd like some chicken in the wings, then some pepperoni and cheese in the pepperoni p'zone - pathetic to what Pizza Hut is capable of

name: Jessica Parker
text: Great pizza

name: Johny Woo
text: They messed up my pizza once in 3 years and fixed it right away. Great customer service !

name: Gary Awroski
text:
This place has gone downhill rapidly.

After discussions with corporate and the regional manager I believe she is the …More

name: trish m
text: Ordered carry out and picked it up HOT.  Tons of toppings! Mmmmm ...... yummy!

name: Angela D Motts
text: THE BEST PIZZA ! WHEN THEY GET YOUR ORDER CORRECT !!!

name: Richard Webb
text: Ordered in person. Was told your pizza ls will be ready in 15 minutes....32 minutes later....we don't know where your pizza is. Total clown act. Manager left cashier to face my demand for a return.

name: Iurii Rudov
text: We love their pizzas! Pizza Hut is different from location to location, this location makes pizzas very good. We love their pan pizzas that baked right enough and stuffed with garlic Parmesan cheese.

name: Adriana
text: For ordering from a nearby location, I expected for my food to arrive within the estimated delivery time frame. I also expected for my food to still be hot, if not fresh. They may have been busy, which is understandable, but I wasn't fully satisfied with my service. The driver was nice though, so that's appreciated.

name: William Rider
text: The sauce was way too sweet and had a strong garlic taste which I ordered a plain hNd tossed crust.

name: Brandon Yocum
text: Fantastic tasting flatbread of Alfredo sauce, white chicken and spinach. Timely and was fresh as could be, just forgot the receipt in the car.  Darn near perfect.

name: beanieb2009
text: They rarely deliver within the time specified. Called one hour after I ordered and the guy said the driver hasn't been back yet but took some $ off my bill and said it'll be delivered within 15 minutes. Called again 20 minutes later and it …More

name: Joe Cote
text: I have not been to pizza hut in years. More than ten.

name: Michael McCann
text: Fast good pizza

name: Jenni Pierce
text: Ots ok for quick pizza.

name: William Pittman
text: The HUT crust is amazing perfectly seasoned and always a great deal with the 2 or more 1 topping medium 5 bucks each!!!

name: roxanne casey
text: again........Please tell your employees that they should be respectful of the folks in the apartments behind the plaza...jerks hang out in the parking lot till 3am, bein loud & inconsiderate...voices carry against brick walls and in an …More

name: Sean Mangan
text: Love the food great price great staff.

name: Wally Anderson
text: I ordered online and waited almost an hour. Called the store and was told the driver already came and left. They didn't leave my food, which had already been paid for, but they did leave the sticker and receipt on my door! Thanks so much for that, now I have a reminder of the food I didn't get.

name: Heather Clark
text: It's a hit and miss usually. Ive had pizza that met my expectations and some that were absolutely horrible.

name: Lexie Green
text: I ordered the smores cookie it came with 1/4 of it covered in marshmellows. (Picture when u order shows full coverage) then i called about it and the staff was very unhelpful didnt do anything to resolve my issue. Its already expensive to …More

name: Sasha Rotanova
text: Great pizza

name: Beiba Zuleta
text: The kids that work here are great. We rarely have a problem. I actually prefer this place to Lake Wylie pizza up the street. They tend to be more consistent.

name: Vishal Chopade
text: Good service!

name: Gypsy
text: I love the pizza here and the super friendly and helpful employees.  Best Pizza Hut around!

name: Derek Dad-Bod
text: Average. You get what you expect from a fast food establishment

text: I love pizza hut over ALL other pizza joints

name: Bobbie
text: Thank Eric you help me get the last of my favorite cheese pizza. Thank you lake Wylie pizza hut.

name: James Wood
text: Great piazza, friendly staff and fast service.

name: Bella Snow
text: Their food is always good but I did not give them 5 stars because they messed up the order quite a few times but they are great about fixing it and sometimes even give you a free pizza.

name: Joseph Harrison
text: They do what they do. Food was fast and hot

name: Chris Rice
text: Quick service.

name: Nancy Wilson
text: Nothing to brag about

name: Guillermo Digorno
text: It’s just okay

name: Sell High
text: Hot Pizza, low price, you can order online. They got wings too what's not to like

name: Juan Mendez
text: Cold food and didn't get what I asked for. On other occasions I have to wait longer for delivery.

name: Michael Johnson
text: By far the worst pizza hut I have been to. Place an order in advance, it was ready once I arrived. Spent 10 minutes waiting to pay while multiple people could have helped but continued to ignore customers in the store front.

name: Tim Edwards
text: This place is garbage.  They lie about the delivery times.  When the food does arrive hours later, it is usually cold.  Call Domino's or Papa Johns.

name: Jackie Mills
text: Ordered online. Shower up an hour late and forgot my wings, the driver said he would go back and get them and we have been waiting for over 2 hours.

text: Tiffany needs training on being a manager-I tried to order online-wanted my $5 discount-SHE HUNG UP ON ME.  I showed up to the store, the young lady that took my order laughed while Tiffany yelled because Tiffany told the young lady to cancel my order.  Currently emailing corporate and Tiffany's manager.  WOW  she hung up on me-
